alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 2:43PM EDT until June 04 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Allagash Township, or 11 miles west of Allagash, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dickey around 310 PM EDT. Allagash Township around 320 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Saint Francis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
